title: Attorney-Bankruptcy Trustee Sues DOE Over Public Service Loans
text: An attorney and bankruptcy trustee says the Education Department is illegally refusing to forgive his student loan debt despite having completed the necessary steps for relief as a public servant, a new lawsuit Thursday alleged. Rolando Ramos-Cardona [says](https://www.bloomberglaw.com/public/document/RAMOSCARDONAvUNITEDSTATESDEPARTMENTOFEDUCATIONetalDocketNo524cv04?doc_id=X61E8UVQM3E9I791E9MQTG7016G) the US Department of Education falsely labeled his employment as a Chapter 13 Bankruptcy Trustee as for-profit, disqualifying him for relief under the Public Service Loan Forgiveness program. Ramos-Cardona argued in the US District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania that Chapter 13 Bankruptcy Trustee operations are public service organizations that are not-for-profit.
